message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product which has been meticulously designed and developed to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product holds immense value for us, reflecting over 2 years of research and development efforts. Given its unique features and capabilities, we believe it's worth more than its face value. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, we are offering this exceptional product to you for $11,000. We understand that this might be an opportunity for you to acquire a high-quality asset at a reasonable price. Please let us know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.
